title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.14 - 23/07/2015
body:
**Update - July 23:** This was completed earlier this morning, next time you login you will begin patching 5.14.

On 23/07/15, starting at 02:30 Sydney Time (16:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.14. At 04:00 Australian Eastern Standard Time (18:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

replies.body: NZT too please? We don't really use UTC down under.

Do some primary school mathematics converting time zones. Wellington is GMT+12 and Sydney is GMT+10. So, add 2 hours to 2:30 and you get 4:30! They will start punching and pouring water over their servers at 4:30 AM here in New Zealand, the maintenance will end at 6:00 AM. So unless you're playing this game past midnight into the first hour of Thursday like someone with no life, you're good to go!

wew lad, was that hard?
Not hard at all, so there is no reason for them not to do it in the first place.
Late reply, but that's not how it works. Getting a drink of water from the tap is easy, so why can't someone else do it? Privileges, yo.

All I wanted was Riot OCE to show some acknowledgement towards its NZ player base. For me, them taking the 5 seconds to type x am AET x am NZT would suffice. 
I don't fully understand your analogy but thanks anyhow.
damn just got into game and it crashed rekt
